name: BEHIND THESE EYES: A Short Horror Story
description: Behind These Eyes is a unique, exciting, and terrifying new horror game. Take control of protagonist Moribu, in his epic fight to overcome his penetrating fear, and save those he holds most dear.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: 2.5 GHz Quad-core Intel or AMD processor Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
